sentences.sContent: ‘Are you going to offer to work over the weekend?’ ‘No way!’
sentences.sCn: “你打算主动提出周末加班吗？”“决不会！”

sentences.sContent: No way will we be finished by five o’clock.
sentences.sCn: 我们决不可能在5点钟之前结束。

sentences.sContent: There’s no way I’m going to pay £300 just for a weekend in Paris.
sentences.sCn: 我决不会花300英镑就为了在巴黎度个周末。

trans.tranOther: used to emphasize that you will not agree or be able to do something
